mapper.insert: insert into plans (plan_id, company_id, code, name, employee_limit_per_month, price_vnd_monthly, price_vnd_yearly, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeLimitPerMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceVndMonthly,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceVndYearly,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update plans set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_limit_per_month = #{employeeLimitPerMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_vnd_monthly = #{priceVndMonthly,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_vnd_yearly = #{priceVndYearly,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select plan_id, company_id, code, name, employee_limit_per_month, price_vnd_monthly, price_vnd_yearly, status, created_at, updated_at from plans where plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select plan_id, company_id, code, name, employee_limit_per_month, price_vnd_monthly, price_vnd_yearly, status, created_at, updated_at from plans
